resources.string: About Bella Mia Wellness Body Spa

Bella Mia Wellness Body Spa is managed by PT . Cantika Pesonapuspa . One of Bella Mia Group company that handles body treatments beauty services. Managed by a professional staff who are experienced in the field of beauty and spa , PT. Cantika Pesonapuspa can be your best choice to do business while preserving the beauty traditions of Indonesia.
